page.title: 16A Shopping Survey
page.content: We went to Queens Road to interview people on their shopping habits. We asked them questions on changes they had seen, and future changes they would like. We interviewed 30 people altogether,most of whom had lived in the area between 2 months and 47 years. People had seen many changes in Queens Road:-there was more traffic and they had seen shops closing and different ones opening. Many people actually shopped here every day. Of those who did not, most shopped here twice a week. We asked people which main towns they used as well. Most shopped in Kingston the rest shopped in Richmond, London, Surbiton and Addlestone. Most people we interviewed would have liked to have a Marks & Spencer locally.
